message: I think this is a fair starting point,  Let's see what you think.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This offer considers the impact of inflation on your share in subsequent rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 55/45 split is a more fair reflection of the changing value of the money.  Let's end this game and avoid further inflation.
